translations: （乐）同度，同音，齐唱；一致，和谐，协调；（英国）公务员工会（Unison）

sentences.sentence: Every morning the kids say the Pledge of Allegiance in unison.
sentences.translation: 每天早晨孩子们齐声进行效忠宣誓。

sentences.sentence: The international community is ready to work in unison against him.
sentences.translation: 国际社会准备齐心协力对付他。

sentences.sentence: In unison, they all shouted, Monday!
sentences.translation: 孩子们异口同声地喊道：“星期一！”
